       Ominous Prime looked across the vastness of the Greek isles. It had to 
admit it was a beautiful place, one that would serve as an important location 
in the future. The volcano, containing Darkfates base, loomed in the distance.
       "Shes in there. We will have her. You failed the first time, fail 
agian and I shall make you suffer." Ominous said coldly to his troops behinde 
him. The new addition of Quasar was with them. She had finally been broken, 
just as Darkmouse would be.
       "Commander we will not fail. Lets send a transmission. I doubt we 
could enter there base anyways." Putnam suggested, handing a Comm unit to 
Ominous.
       He took it, held it to his mouth and said, "Darkmouse, energon flows 
through your veins. You belong with the Energonians. Join us, our superior 
race, and relish in the glory of victory that will be ours!" He paused, face 
darkened. "If you do decline this offer, however, we will have to take you by 
force. And I do promise you that we will not fail agian."

       

--part1_c6.1060f87d.27a0a671_boundary
